quick_start.rst

Quick Start¶

  • install Vagrant.

  • install VirtualBox.

  • clone the github repo:

    git clone git@github.com:cloudify-cosmo/cloudify-packager.git

  • go to the vagrant directory

  • run:

    vagrant up packman
vagrant ssh packman
cd ~/examples
sudo su
pkm make

  • review the retrieved resources in /sources

  • review the created deb files in /packages
